item.description:
Join the group as we snowshoe through Maudsley State Park in Newburyport.

- Day: Sunday February 8th
- Time: Meet in the parking lot at 1:00
- Where: Maudsley State Park
- What to Bring: Bring appropriate gear, dress in layers, and bring some drinks and snacks
- Other: Rental equipment info-see below*
- Directions:

From North and South: Take Rte. 95, exit 57 to Rte. 113 east. Follow 113 east for half a mile and turn left on Noble St. At stop sign turn left onto Ferry Rd., bear left at fork and follow signs.

From West: Take I-495 exit 55 to Rte. 110 east. Continue 1 mile to Merrill St., turn right at second light. Continue on Merrill St./Spofford St. for 1.5 miles. Turn right before stop sign onto Ferry Rd., follow signs.

* Rentals for both snowshoes and cross country ski's: available at the Sports Shop in Wenham on Main street. #978.468.4455. $18 per day for either equipment-no Â½ day rate available.

If you want my cell phone number in case you need to contact me, please email me.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the parking lot at 1:00 PM
item.name: Snowshoeing at Maudsley State Park in Newburyport, MA
